options.description: show this help message and exit
Input metadata in TOML describing COMMON and other entires
Genetic Code ID. 1 by default, and 11 for bacteria. See https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Taxonomy/Utils/wprintgc.cgi
Rename setting for features and qualifiers
A set of Feature-Qualifier pairs allowed in the output. See https://www.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/assets/files/pdf/ddbj/fq-e.pdf
Specify annotation file name as output
[debug] Choose log level from (DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR) (default: INFO).
